landing.title: Welcome to AI-Komekshi - your personal job search assistant.
landing.subtitle: Build smart chatbots for WhatsApp, Telegram, Instagram, and other messengers - with CRM integration and full business automation.

main.title: One System - All Messengers.
main.sub: Manage customer communication across all messengers from one convenient platform. Replace dozens of tools with a single smart system for messaging, sales, and support.
main.mode-sub: Easily switch between light and dark modes or create your own theme.
main.auto-sub: Our chatbots help answer customer questions 24/7, collect leads, and boost satisfaction.
main.panel: All your chats, bots, operators, and analytics - in one simple dashboard.
main.panel-sub: Control communication and performance in one window: from incoming messages to analytics for every bot and channel.
main.messengers: Connect in Just a Few Steps
main.messengers-sub: Easily integrate your AI assistant with popular messengers

users.edu-sub: A bot consultant for programs and schedules
users.services-sub: Initial consultations, lead collection, and client filtering
users.assitant-sub: Automatically identifies interest, handles objections, and guides to payment
users.clinics-sub: Online booking and consultation via messengers

features.title: All in One Place
features.sub: We create chatbots and assistants precisely tailored to your business - from online stores to service industries and sales automation.

lang.title: Multilingual by Default
lang.sub: Your bot speaks the client's language - automatically. Add support for Russian, English, Kazakh, and more right out of the box. The virtual assistant detects the language and adjusts responses accordingly.

dashboard.dashboard: Analytics and Management in One Place
dashboard.sub: Monitor, improve, manage. The dashboard shows how many clients are chatting, where drop-offs happen, how many leads are closed - all in real time.
dashboard.two: React quickly to bottlenecks in the sales funnel

responsive.title: Works on Any Device
responsive.sub: Manage bots from your phone, tablet, or laptop. Setup, replies, and script editing - all available online through the browser. No app installations or special access required.
responsive.one: Manage bots from any browser without installing software.
responsive.two: Edit scripts in real-time from any device.
responsive.three: Access settings in one click, wherever you are.

footer.sub: Chat with our bot right here...

signIn.text: Please enter your credentials to log in!
signIn.fotter-text: Don't have an account yet? Sign up

dashboard.subtitle: Your personal AI assistant is ready to help you find the perfect job.

services.title: Choose the service you need
services.subtitle: Comprehensive tools for successful job search

aiChat.subtitle: How can I help you find a job today?

resume.title: Help me prepare a resume with my specific needs
resume.prompt: I want to create an effective resume that highlights my strengths and skills. Please consider that I have a disability and I want to properly present my experience to employers.

vacancies.title: Find suitable vacancies for people with disabilities
vacancies.prompt: Help me find employers and vacancies that are open to hiring people with disabilities. Tell me about employment programs and quotas.

interview.title: Prepare me for an interview
interview.prompt: Give me advice on interview preparation. How to talk about my abilities, how to discuss necessary workplace adaptations, and how to make a positive impression.

careers.title: What careers suit my skills?
careers.prompt: Help me identify career opportunities and professions that are suitable for people with various types of disabilities. Tell me about remote work and flexible employment options.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.praisePlaceholder: What was satisfying about this response?
feedback.blameLabel: What type of issue do you wish to report? (optional)
feedback.blamePlaceholder: What was unsatisfying about this response?

history.deleteAllMessage: Are you sure you want to delete all chat history? This action cannot be undone.

errors.generalError: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

mockResponses.fileAnalysis:
Excellent! I can see the attached files! 🔍

**What I can do with images:**

📋 **Resume Analysis** - if it's a scan or photo of a resume, I'll analyze the structure and give improvement tips

📄 **Document Analysis** - help analyze any employment-related documents

💼 **Vacancy Analysis** - if it's a screenshot of a job posting, I'll suggest how to better prepare for it

🎯 **Interview Preparation** - if it's company materials, I'll help prepare questions

Describe what exactly is in the image, and I'll give you the most useful advice for your job search!
mockResponses.resumeHelp:
Of course, I'll help you create an effective resume! Here are the main recommendations:

1. **Resume Structure:**
   - Personal information
   - Professional objective
   - Education
   - Work experience
   - Skills and competencies
   - Additional information

2. **Composition Tips:**
   - Focus on your achievements and skills
   - Use clear formulations
   - Specify concrete results

Would you like me to help create a resume for a specific vacancy?
mockResponses.jobSearch:
I'll help you find suitable vacancies! Here's where to look for work:

1. **Specialized sites for people with disabilities:**
   - Special People (special-people.com)
   - Diswork.com
   - Jobs for Everyone

2. **Employment quotas:**
   - Companies with 100+ employees must have a 3% quota
   - Government organizations - 4% quota

3. **Support:**
   - Employment centers
   - NGOs supporting people with disabilities

What field of activity interests you?
mockResponses.interviewPrep:
Great question! Here are interview preparation tips:

1. **Preparation:**
   - Study the company and vacancy
   - Prepare examples of your achievements
   - Think of questions for the employer

2. **Discussing specifics:**
   - Be honest about your needs
   - Explain how your skills will help the company
   - Discuss necessary workplace adaptations

3. **Confidence:**
   - Focus on your strengths
   - Show enthusiasm and motivation

Is there a specific vacancy you're preparing for?
mockResponses.general:
Thank you for your question! I'm ready to help you with job searching.

As your AI job search assistant, I can:
- Help create a resume
- Find suitable vacancies
- Prepare for interviews
- Give career development advice

How specifically can I help? Tell me more about your situation.
